Name: CHERNOBYL - Death May Die
About the game: You wake up alone in the hospital, remembering nothing with the only desire - to find out the whole truth that the walls of Chernobyl hide. Old videos will be your true friend on the way to finding the truth. Study the evidence in detail and be extremely careful, as radiation can be dangerous to the health of the main character. Several storylines, an amazing atmosphere and an unpredictable ending await you in this game. You will be a living target! Do not stand still and move more, then you can achieve your goal. Gameplay This game is primarily a 'walking simulator' genre with puzzle-solving elements. VHS special filter on screen: VHS aesthetic emulates the look and feel of CRT screens including phosphor screen trail and bleeding. A large open world with many terrible secrets awaits you. Use your inventory and read each note to solve challenging tasks in the game.
